医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示 ChatGPT 在急诊医学中的局限性加州大学旧金山分校的一项新研究发现，如果急诊科取消 ChatGPT，它可能会建议一些患者进行不必要的 X 光检查和抗生素治疗，并接纳其他不需要住院治疗的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Study-reveals-limitations-of-ChatGPT-in-emergency-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Study-reveals-limitations-of-ChatGPT-in-emergency-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6252e027-8c94-41a6-9a4e-06cc81cafc80 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 12:48:00 -0400 Study reveals limitations of ChatGPT in emergency medicine
紫菜可以成为素食者可靠的维生素 B12 来源吗？一项研究表明，每天 5 克紫菜可以改善素食者的维生素 B12 状态，这表明紫菜是这种必需营养素的有效膳食来源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Can-nori-be-a-reliable-vitamin-B12-source-for-vegetarians.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Can-nori-be-a-reliable-vitamin-B12-source-for-vegetarians.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2448972-7aaf-416c-a2c5-c40a975f325a Tue, 08 Oct 2024 12:28:00 -0400 Can nori be a reliable vitamin B12 source for vegetarians?
电针在肥胖管理方面显示出前景由新加坡南洋理工大学（NTU Singapore）和香港大学（HKU）领导的科学家团队发现了证据，证明电针——一种传统中医（TCM）治疗方法——可以用来控制肥胖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Electro-acupuncture-shows-promise-in-obesity-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Electro-acupuncture-shows-promise-in-obesity-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7711c53-0bbe-4874-8e30-bd9ff103b46f Tue, 08 Oct 2024 11:55:00 -0400 Electro-acupuncture shows promise in obesity management
CBT 应用程序有望预防抑郁症研究发现，认知行为疗法（CBT）应用程序可以显着预防高危年轻人抑郁症的增加，并且可以作为一项具有成本效益的公共心理健康措施来实施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/CBT-app-shows-promise-in-preventing-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/CBT-app-shows-promise-in-preventing-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=928d1825-e4b5-4c22-ba00-27127d4f7ea5 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 10:32:09 -0400 CBT app shows promise in preventing depression
多种维生素可以改善老年人的情绪并减轻压力吗？研究人员调查了多种维生素矿物质补充剂改善老年人日常功能的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Can-multivitamins-improve-mood-and-reduce-stress-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Can-multivitamins-improve-mood-and-reduce-stress-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10e7f87a-bb1f-4167-ac60-7988433630ac Tue, 08 Oct 2024 10:28:00 -0400 Can multivitamins improve mood and reduce stress in older adults?
英国有 100 万成年电子烟使用者从未经常吸烟研究人员估计了英国不经常吸烟的成年人吸电子烟的趋势。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/1-million-adult-vapers-in-England-have-never-regularly-smoked.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/1-million-adult-vapers-in-England-have-never-regularly-smoked.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c8c915e-2fac-4682-9596-1187b0627df0 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 10:14:00 -0400 1 million adult vapers in England have never regularly smoked
研究：满足身体活动指南的经济收益满足身体活动建议可以带来显着的经济效益。这些好处可以表现为个人工资收入和社会医疗保健成本的降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Study-Economic-gains-from-meeting-physical-activity-guidelines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Study-Economic-gains-from-meeting-physical-activity-guidelines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7150bbc3-3da9-4684-9990-5a563be48b59 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 10:02:16 -0400 Study: Economic gains from meeting physical activity guidelines
Monmouth Scientific 将在实验室创新展上展示可持续清洁空气解决方案。加入 Monmouth Scientific 实验室创新中心，探索先进的清洁空气解决方案并了解改变实验室实践的可持续技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Monmouth-Scientific-to-showcase-Sustainable-Clean-Air-Solutions-at-Lab-Innovations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Monmouth-Scientific-to-showcase-Sustainable-Clean-Air-Solutions-at-Lab-Innovations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61dc2e8f-33b5-48a3-9efe-bcd4bb35c79a Tue, 08 Oct 2024 09:36:00 -0400 Monmouth Scientific to showcase Sustainable Clean Air Solutions at Lab Innovations.
超加工食品对某些群体的负面影响明显研究人员评估了生活方式因素如何影响健康相关的生活质量与超加工食品消费之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Negative-impacts-of-ultra-processed-foods-pronounced-in-certain-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Negative-impacts-of-ultra-processed-foods-pronounced-in-certain-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=740818aa-a88a-4335-ab4b-8fc8390fd9b9 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 09:36:00 -0400 Negative impacts of ultra-processed foods pronounced in certain groups
人工甜味剂摄入量与不良妊娠结局之间的关系研究人员确定了人工甜味剂与妊娠结局之间的因果关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Relationship- Between-intake-of-artificial-sweeteners-and-adverse-pregnancy-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Relationship- Between-intake-of-artificial-sweeteners-and-adverse-pregnancy-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66f3b44d-a0d4-4211-a45d-dba2062dd230 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 09:15:00 -0400 Relationship between intake of artificial sweeteners and adverse pregnancy outcomes
